title: Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo
description: Inizjattiva ġdida mill-Kunsill Lokali tal-Belt Valletta se tgħaqqad klassijiet tal-iskola primarja tal-Belt ma' dawk f'Rahovec fil-Kosovo permezz ta’ konferenzi online. L-inizjattiva edukattiva u kulturali bl-isem ta’ "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" tippermetti biex it-tfal miż-żewġ pajjiżi jesploraw u jaqsmu ma’ xulxin kulturi u esperjenzi fil-klassi, inkluż dawk edukattivi. The post Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo
description_translated: A new initiative from the Valletta Local Council will combine City Primary School classes with those in Randa in Kosovo through online conferences. The educational and cultural initiative called "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" allows children from both countries to explore and share with each other cultures and experiences in the classroom, including educational ones. The post Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo
description: Inizjattiva ġdida mill-Kunsill Lokali tal-Belt Valletta se tgħaqqad klassijiet tal-iskola primarja tal-Belt ma' dawk f'Rahovec fil-Kosovo permezz ta’ konferenzi online. L-inizjattiva edukattiva u kulturali bl-isem ta’ "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" tippermetti biex it-tfal miż-żewġ pajjiżi jesploraw u jaqsmu ma’ xulxin kulturi u esperjenzi fil-klassi, inkluż dawk edukattivi. The post Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo
description_translated: A new initiative from the Valletta Local Council will combine City Primary School classes with those in Randa in Kosovo through online conferences. The educational and cultural initiative called "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" allows children from both countries to explore and share with each other cultures and experiences in the classroom, including educational ones. The post Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo
description: Inizjattiva ġdida mill-Kunsill Lokali tal-Belt Valletta se tgħaqqad klassijiet tal-iskola primarja tal-Belt ma' dawk f'Rahovec fil-Kosovo permezz ta’ konferenzi online. L-inizjattiva edukattiva u kulturali bl-isem ta’ "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" tippermetti biex it-tfal miż-żewġ pajjiżi jesploraw u jaqsmu ma’ xulxin kulturi u esperjenzi fil-klassi, inkluż dawk edukattivi. The post Tfal fl-iskejjel tal-Belt Valletta jingħaqdu ma’ tfal fil-Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo
description_translated: A new initiative from the Valletta Local Council will combine City Primary School classes with those in Randa in Kosovo through online conferences. The educational and cultural initiative called "Connecting Classrooms: Bridges of Culture and Innovation" allows children from both countries to explore and share with each other cultures and experiences in the classroom, including educational ones. The post Children in Valletta schools join children in Kosovo appeared first on Newsbook.

title_translated: "Why have many measures been taken on 7 counterfeit ID cards?" - PN
description_translated: The Nationalist Party has strongly criticized the Labor Government, and accused it of launching an aggressive propaganda campaign to disrupt the Maltese and Gozitan public from its mismanagement of the residence and work permits system over the past 11 years. The Opposition claims that the Government has lost control so much that it does not know where registered individuals are located in fake addresses. - PN appeared first on Newsbook.

description_translated: This morning he was arraigned in court where he pleaded not guilty and was held in custody.

title: Miċħuda proposta għal żona ta’ protezzjoni mill-kaċċa qrib l-iskejjel – Birdlife Malta
description: Fil-Kumitat Ornis, ġiet miċħuda proposta ta’ Birdlife Malta biex tinħoloq żona ta’ protezzjoni mill-kaċċa ta’ 200 metru madwar l-iskejjel f’Malta u Għawdex. L-NGO qalet fi stqarrija li filwaqt li l-bajjiet, l-arterji prinċipali, u ċ-ċimiterji għandhom dawn iż-żoni ta’ protezzjoni, “huwa tal-mistħija u diżappuntanti li dawk li jpoġġu madwar il-mejda tal-Ornis—magħżulin mill-Gvern ta’ Malta—ma appoġġjawx l-inklużjoni tal-iskejjel f’din il-lista biex jipproteġu t-tfal tagħna.” Il-proposta tressqet quddiem il-Kumitat Ornis aktar minn sena ilu.The post Miċħuda proposta għal żona ta’ protezzjoni mill-kaċċa qrib l-iskejjel – Birdlife Malta appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Rejected a proposal for a hunting protection area near schools-BirdLife Malta
description_translated: In the Ornis Committee, a proposal from Birdlife Malta was rejected to create a 200-meter hunting area across schools in Malta and Gozo. The NGO said in a statement that while beaches, main arteries, and cemeteries have these protective areas, "it is shameful and disappointing that those who sit around the Ornis table-chosen by the Government of Malta-did not support the inclusion of our schools." The proposal was submitted to the Ornis Committee more than a year ago.The Post rejected a proposal for a hunting area near schools-BirdLife Malta appeared first on Newsbook.

description: Rio Micallef ta’ 41 sena mill-Marsa, David Tabone ta’ 40 sena min-Naxxar u Darren James Vella ta’ 34 sena minn Birkirkara jinstabu akkużati li ttraffikaw id-droga ecstasy fl-2008. title_translated: The trial finds 2 guilty and relieves another in the case of ecstasy trafficking
description_translated: 41-year-old Rio Micallef from Marsa, 40-year-old David Tabone from Naxxar and 34-year-old Darren James Vella from Birkirkara are found accused of trafficking in 2008. The post The trial finds 2 guilty and releases another in the case of ecstasy trafficking appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Digriet ġdid tal-Vatikan jiċċara l-proċeduri dwar intenzjonijiet tal-quddies
description: F’Digriet approvat mill-Papa Franġisku f’Ħadd il-Palm, id-Dikasteru għall-Kleru ħareġ normi riveduti dwar id-dixxiplina tal-Knisja fejn jidħlu intenzjonijiet tal-quddies. Il-liġi aġġornata, li tidħol fis-seħħ nhar l-Għid, tfittex li tħares kemm l-integrità spiritwali tas-sagrifiċċju Ewkaristiku u kemm il-fiduċja li jpoġġu n-nies f’dak li tagħmel il-Knisja bl-offerti tagħhom.The post Digriet ġdid tal-Vatikan jiċċara l-proċeduri dwar intenzjonijiet tal-quddies appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: A new Vatican decree clarifies the procedures for Mass intentions
description_translated: In a decree approved by Pope Francis on Palm Sunday, the decaster for the clergy emerged revised norms on the discipline of the Church regarding Mass intentions. The updated law, which comes into effect on Easter, seeks to protect both the spiritual integrity of the Eucharistic sacrifice and the confidence that people put in what the Church does with their offers.

description_translated: Pope Francis directed his words to the pilgrims gathered in the Paul VI Hall of the Vatican where he spoke on the theme of paternity while continuing his catechesis about the family.

title: Momentum jikkritika l-konċentrazzjoni tal-faċilitajiet tal-iskart ħdejn id-djar

description: Ingħata bidu uffiċjalment lill-Valletta Green Festival ta' din is-sena. Dan il-festival se jwassal biex Pjazza San Ġorġ tinbidel fi ġnien mill-isbaħ b’żewġ funtani tal-ilma, siġar kbar, arbuxelli u bosta fjuri ikkuluriti.The post Funtani, siġar u fjuri fi Pjazza San Ġorġ għall-Valletta Green Festival appeared first on Newsbook.

title: Tkunux kompliċi b’ebda mod fil-qtil ta’ ħajja umana-L-Isqof Awżiljarju
description: L-Isqof Galea Curmi semma kif tul is-snin, “aħna bqajna ngħożżu l-valur tal-ħajja umana.” Qal li dan hu messaġġ tant importanti għal żmienna, meta hemm min qiegħed jirraġuna li jekk bniedem ikun qed ibati, tkun qed tgħinu jekk ittemmlu ħajtu ħalli jitlaq għal ħajja oħra u b’hekk ittaffilu t-tbatija. “Il-Papa Franġisku għallimna: dan ikun ’falliment tal-imħabba,’”spjega l-Isqof.The post Tkunux kompliċi b’ebda mod fil-qtil ta’ ħajja umana-L-Isqof Awżiljarju appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Be complicit in any way in the killing of a human life-the auxiliary bishop
description_translated: Bishop Galea Curmi mentioned how over the years, "we have continued to cherish the value of human life." He said that this is such an important message for our time, when there is a reason that if a man is suffering, he will help him if he completes his life to leave for another life and thus alleviate his suffering. "Pope Francis has taught us: this would be a 'failure of love,'" explained the Bishop.

title: Il-BOV jorganizza webinar biex iżid l-għarfien dwar l-iscams u l-phishing
description: Il-Bank of Valletta ħabbar l-ewwel webinar pubbliku, bil-għan li jgħin lill-individwi jipproteġu lilhom infushom minn scams u phishing permezz ta’ pariri prattiċi dwar kif jistgħu jħarsu l-informazzjoni personali u finanzjarja tagħhom. Il-webinar ta’ siegħa se jsir online nhar l-Erbgħa 7 ta’ Mejju 2025 fil-5pm. Huwa miftuħ għall-pubbliku, mingħajr ħlas, u se jkun bil-Malti.The post Il-BOV jorganizza webinar biex iżid l-għarfien dwar l-iscams u l-phishing appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: BOV organizes webinar to increase awareness about scams and phishing
description_translated: The Bank of Valletta announced the first public web, with the aim of helping individuals protect themselves from scams and phishing through practical advice on how to safeguard their personal and financial information. The hourly webinar will be held online on Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 5pm. It is open to the public, free of charge, and will be in Maltese.

title: Ħames snin ħabs wara li wettaq 3 serqiet fi 3 ijiem
description: Raġel ngħata sentenza ta' ħames snin ħabs u mmultat €5,000 wara li nstab ħati li wettaq tliet serqiet fi tlett ijiem.The post Ħames snin ħabs wara li wettaq 3 serqiet fi 3 ijiem appeared first on Newsbook.

description: “Illum ma tista’ sserraħ fuq ebda tip ta’ mħabba. Imma min jikkonsagra ruħu lil Alla, almenu jaf li l-parti l-oħra hi fidila, għax hu Ġesù”.The post “Ġesù hu dejjem fidil lejna” – L-Isqof ta’ Għawdex fil-Konsagrazzjoni ta’ verġni appeared first on Newsbook.

title: “Kuntent li niċċelebra għeluq snini fl-anniversarju ta’ ommi u missieri” – Kurt Calleja
description: Kurt twieled proprju fir-raba’ anniversarju taż-żwieġ tal-ġenituri tiegħu Brian u Rita. Illum huma qed jiċelebraw 38 sena miżżewġin. Apparti lil Kurt, il-koppja Calleja għandhom tifel ieħor, il-mużiċist u kantant Kevin Paul Calleja.The post “Kuntent li niċċelebra għeluq snini fl-anniversarju ta’ ommi u missieri” – Kurt Calleja appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: “I am happy to celebrate a birthday birthday on my mother's and father's anniversary”-Kurt Calleja
description_translated: Kurt was born in the fourth anniversary of his parents' marriage Brian and Rita. Today they are celebrating 38 years married. Apart from Kurt, the Calleja couple have another boy, musician and singer Kevin Paul Calleja.

title: Approvat pjan ta’ Iżrael li jokkupa t-territorju sħiħ ta’ Gaża
description: Skont rapporti, il-mexxejja politiċi u militari ta’ Iżrael approvaw pjanijiet biex jespandu l-offensiva ta’ Gaza u jieħdu f’idejhom il-kunsinni tal-għajnuna għaż-żona assedjata.The post Approvat pjan ta’ Iżrael li jokkupa t-territorju sħiħ ta’ Gaża appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Approved Israel's plan occupying the whole territory of Gaza
description_translated: According to reports, Israel's political and military leaders have approved plans to expand Gaza's offensive and take over aid deliveries to the besieged area.

title: Il-Konklavi: Kif jiġi elett Papa
description: Dawn huma l-kelmiet stampati fuq kull karta tal-vot li l-133 kardinal elettur se jużaw biex jagħżlu l-267 Suċċessur ta’ Pietru. Il-karta hi rettangolari, bil-frażi Latina fuq il-parti ta’ fuq waqt li l-parti ta’ isfel titħalla votja għall-kardinal biex jikteb l-isem tal-kandidat magħżul tiegħu. Il-karta hi ddisinjata biex tintewa min-nofs – dettall preskritt mill-Kostituzzjoni Appostolika Universi Dominici Gregis.The post Il-Konklavi: Kif jiġi elett Papa appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: Conclave: How Pope is elected
description_translated: These are the words printed on each voting card that the 133 Cardinal Elector will use to select Peter's 267 successors. The paper is rectangular, with the Latin phrase on the top while the lower part is allowed to vote for the Cardinal to write the name of his chosen candidate. The paper is designed to fold in the middle-a detail prescribed by the Apostolic Constitution Universes Dominici Gregis.The post Conclave: How Pope is elected appeared first on Newsbook.

title_translated: "We are still behind; there are not enough beds and palliative care devices"-President Emeritus

title: Il-Kummissarju għall-Istandards jikkritika l-pożizzjoni ta’ Abela dwar id-dikjarazzjonijiet tal-assi tal-kabinett
description: Il-Kummissarju għall-Istandards Joseph Azzopardi kkritika lill-Prim Ministru Robert Abela għal "pass sostanzjali lura fit-trasparenza" wara r-rifjut tiegħu li jippubblika d-dikjarazzjonijiet tal-assi tal-membri tal-kabinett – b'kuntrast mal-predeċessuri tiegħu.The post Il-Kummissarju għall-Istandards jikkritika l-pożizzjoni ta’ Abela dwar id-dikjarazzjonijiet tal-assi tal-kabinett appeared first on Newsbook.
title_translated: The Commissioner for Standards criticizes Abela's position on Cabinet asset statements
description_translated: Standards Commissioner Joseph Azzopardi criticized Prime Minister Robert Abela for a "substantial step back in transparency" following his refusal to publish the Cabinet Members' statements-in contrast to his predecessors. The post of the Commissioner for the Cabinet's assets.
